alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 2:35AM CDT until June 03 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Arkansas River at Derby affecting Sedgwick County. Arkansas River near Mulvane affecting Sedgwick and Sumner Counties. Arkansas River at Oxford affecting Sumner County. Arkansas River at Arkansas City affecting Cowley County. For the Arkansas River...including Great Bend, Hutchinson, Haven, Derby, Mulvane, Oxford, Arkansas City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Oxford. * WHEN...From this evening to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Low lying agricultural fields flood north of the river gage site. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 18.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Arkansas River Oxford 17.0 10.4 Wed 1 am CDT 18.6 16.0 11.6 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
